枿枿枿

枿字的基本解释

枿
niè
古同“蘖”（ａ．树木砍去后又长出的芽子，如“山无槎枿。”ｂ．树木砍去后留下的树桩子，如“今洲上犹有陈根余枿。”）。

枿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》五割切，入曷，疑。］
(1)树木砍伐后留下的根株。
(2)比喻余孽。
(3)引申为稳，不动。参见“枿坐”。
(4)树木砍伐后新芽萌生。
(5)泛指花木新芽萌生。
(6)树木砍伐后又生的新芽或分枝。
(7)斩伐，讨灭。
(8)谓向上昂起。

枿字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　枿； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页518第02
同櫱。　又【爾雅·釋詁】枿，餘也。【郭註】陳、鄭之閒曰枿，晉、衞之閒曰烈，皆伐木餘也。　又【張衡·東京賦】山無槎枿。【註】斜曰槎，斬而復生曰枿。

枿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
枿字的起名意思

树木砍伐后留下的根株。引申为稳，不动，泛指花木新芽萌生。

Zhi
Basic explanation of words
Zhi
niè
Ancient Tong "Tiller" (a. The sprouts that grow after the trees are cut, such as "there is no sage in the mountains." b. The stumps left behind after the trees are cut, such as "There are still Chen roots on the continent." ).
Zhi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" five cuts, enters, suspicious. ]
(1) Roots left behind after felling of trees.
(2) As a metaphor for remnants.
(3) The extension is stable and immobile. See "Yi Sit".
(4) New buds sprout after the trees are felled.
(5) Generally refers to the budding of flowers and trees.
(6) The new shoots or branches that grow after the trees are felled.
(7) Cut down and destroy.
(8) Said to rise upward.
Zhi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枿; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 518 02
The same.　[Erya·Shiu]Zi, Yu Ye. [Guo's Note] Chen and Zheng Zhixian said Ji, and Jin and Wei Zhixian said Lie, both of them felling trees.　[Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu] The mountain has no 槎枿. [Note] Obliquely said cha, cut and resurrected said nai.
Zhi
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
Zhi
Name meaning
The roots of trees after felling. The extension is stable and immobile, which generally refers to the buds of flowers and trees sprouting.
è, niè
сущ.
1) пень (перен. также: остаток, излишек)
巨枿 большой остаток (излишек)
2) молодой побег от старого пня
山有槎枿 в горах есть молодые побеги на пнях от срубленных деревьев
